StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramDataByContractID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ContractID int ) AS
SELECT pa.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, c.CONTRACT_ID, p.PROGRAM_ID, p.PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION, p.PROGRAM_TYPE, c.DUTY_PREFERENCE1, c.DUTY_PREFERENCE2, c.DUTY_PREFERENCE3, pa.PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE FROM dbo.CONTRACT c WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY pa ON c.CONTRACT_ID = pa.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN dbo.PROGRAM p ON pa.PROGRAM_ID = p.PROGRAM_ID WHERE c.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
